q_en: What is the progress of sewing tasks for William?
gt:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the progress of sewing tasks for our customer, William. Here's a summary of the tasks:

| Task ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status       |
|---------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| 28      | 210            | 210              | Completed ‚úÖ |
| 29      | 180            | 180              | Completed ‚úÖ |
| 30      | 195            | 195              | Completed ‚úÖ |

All of William's sewing tasks are completed! üéâ If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'William';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "William"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '8';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (8);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs and their quantities for the orders of customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT SUM(completed_number) FROM sewing_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (28, 29, 30);
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity of sewing tasks for the order products of customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT SUM(number) FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (8);
steps.description: Calculate the total quantity of products in the orders of customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT (SUM(completed_number) / SUM(number)) * 100 AS progress FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.order_id IN (8);
steps.description: Calculate the progress of sewing tasks for customer "William"

response:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the progress of sewing tasks for our customer, William. Here's a summary of the information:

| Task Details                  | Quantity |
|-------------------------------|----------|
| Total Quantity of Products    | 585      |
| Total Completed Sewing Tasks  | 585      |
| Progress                      | 100%     |

Great news! üéâ All of William's sewing tasks are completed, with a progress of 100%. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! üòä
